website_summaries.verdict: This daily multi is formulated for overall health, with a blend of vitamins and minerals that support the immune system and promote tissue and bone health.
pros: Good supplement for those with certain allergies, as it has no lactose, gluten, wheat, fish or shellfish, peanuts, or eggs
cons: Drinking a lot of water is recommended to avoid a vitamin taste while digesting

customer_reviews.title: FRAUD
customer_reviews.text: I ordered and paid for 90 Rainbow Light tablets from Bearclaw Capital. The small plastic bottle I received said "30 tablets" on its regular label. But there was also a sticker glued to the side of the bottle that said "90 tablets" and "new." When I opened the bottle, I found inside 30 tablets. Thinking there had been an error, I checked my prior order, which was still unopened. I had ordered and paid for 90 tablets. I had received a bottle with the same labels. It's still unopened. Anybody want to bet on how many tablets are inside?
customer_reviews.author: steve hamrick

customer_reviews.title: The formula of these is significantly different than the real vitamins
customer_reviews.text: Do not order these if you want the real rainbow light Active Adult 50+ vitamins. The formula is significantly different with much lower doses of every single thing, even thought the label looks identical. They have a green lid. The real ones have a white lid. I think these are fake and a rip off.
customer_reviews.author: E. A. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware! Only received 30 when I ordered 90.
customer_reviews.text: Partly my fault for not looking more closely upon receipt but I received only 30 tablets when I paid for 90. Realized this morning I was already running out and noticed the bottle was only 30 tablets. I selected return on the order and lo and behold this item is not eligible for return. Buyer beware the QC on these orders my be innacurate.
customer_reviews.author: Chap

customer_reviews.title: Whats with the Betaine Hydrochloride in a Multi Vitamin Supplement.
customer_reviews.text: I have just realised why Im having a lot of problems with excess acid. This Multi Vitamin Supplement has Betaine Hydrochloride in it. As an O blood type I already have problems with acid stomach, so extra Betaine is very damaging. I am so disappointed to find in the fine print after using this for so long and will now be looking for a different supplement. Felt so much better today not taking it.
customer_reviews.author: Listentothis

customer_reviews.title: New product for me- same great brand!
customer_reviews.text: I used to use the 40+ vitamin from this company (and gave it a rave review), but could never manage to take the full number of tablets recommended per day. The Active Adult is a single tablet per day, and has a nice blend of vitamins, minerals, and supplemental ingredients. With one tablet, it's easy to add something else if needed. As a lovely bonus, I can smell the Rosemary extract in these, an aroma I find pleasing. Highly recommended- and I really appreciate that they changed the name from Senior something to "active adult." I'll tell you when I'm a senior, darn it! Until then I'm just an active adult with a lot of experience and really good vitamins!
customer_reviews.author: BooksJJC

customer_reviews.title: Not FODMAP friendly!
customer_reviews.text: If you eat low FODMAP these may not be the daily vitamin for you. Pretty sure these are really upsetting my stomach. They have a lot of high FODMAP ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: The 411

customer_reviews.title: No Tummy Problems
customer_reviews.text: These tablets do not upset my stomach. I don't have a sensitive stomach, but the high quality vitamins available at the stores just seemed to feel like a rock trying to dissolve even after eating a large meal. The reviews seemed to indicate this product is different and it sure is. Also, these do not produce that vitamin aftertaste that a lot of vitamins do. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: huge
customer_reviews.text: I waded through all sorts of multivitamins made for seniors, specifically looking for small tablets or gel capsules that would be easy to swallow. Based on what I understood, these should have been gel caps & not tablets. They are huge tablets & horrible to swallow. I've used Rainbow vitamins before & they were no where as huge. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nanagof4

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need in one pill!
customer_reviews.text: I love these vitamins and am so glad to find something that doesn’t upset my husband’s stomach. I originally bought them for him, but I have switched to them myself for convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen F.

customer_reviews.title: Clean, healthy vitamin
customer_reviews.text: I started using these vitamins a few years ago, encouraged by my daughter. I wanted something that was healthy and food based, without chemicals. I have been very happy with Rainbow Light.
customer_reviews.author: Bonita Hebert

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It's food based; not chemical based like Centrum Silver. It's cheaper too (unless Centrum's on sale) and what a boost in my semi - annual doctor's lab results (blood work) since I've been on this for several years now. I'm not much into my veggies, but this makes up for it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Boomers will like this.
customer_reviews.text: Took about a solid to week or two, but constantly feel, a better physical state. Happy with recent eye examine, having Type 2 Diabetes. No macular problems.Update 3/17. Continue to find everyday reasons to use. Eye strength continues to grow. Energy level is great, not over the top, but feels right for my age.
customer_reviews.author: Doogerexpress

customer_reviews.title: I buy these vitamins for my Mom and she said ...
customer_reviews.text: I buy these vitamins for my Mom and she said she was extremely tired and no energy when she doesn't take them. I just wish they weren't so EXPENSIVE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long time  user
customer_reviews.text: Have used this supplement for a loonnnnngggg time. Like the fact that it has digestive enzymes as I have acid reflex.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Sadie

customer_reviews.title: They don't make me sick
customer_reviews.text: I really like these vitamins and I like that they're made for man and woman 50 plus and that they don't have any hormones in them and they have the good vitamin B12, they seem to be pretty good for the value cost
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Ordered and paid for 90 tablets and received 30
customer_reviews.text: The order was for 90 tablets and I received a bottle with 30 tablets. Now can’t return due to sellers’ policy? Fraud!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Turned brown & smelled spoiled after 2/3 use.
customer_reviews.text: Before I was 2/3 through, pills took on a smell like they were spoiling, turning brownish. I keep my vitamins and such in cool, dry area, so I don't appreciate them not remaining the same until finished, and they weren't expired. Good product, but if I buy, I will keep in fridge with silica packs in a ziplock bag.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Boosts energy
customer_reviews.text: Thought I would give it a try. I am 58 and not a big fan of vitamins. Decided to try. So far so good. I feel energetic. And the annoying stomach bloat is lessened. Could be the probiotics is helping. However pill is rather large and hard to swallow.
customer_reviews.author: Devina

customer_reviews.title: Lower Dosage for the same price!
customer_reviews.text: Amount per serving in the picture is different than what was on the bottle I received. Most of the vitamin dosages are much lower than what is being advertised in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: It's a Multi-Vitamin
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how much there is to say about this. One thing I can say is that if you are taking this with multiple other pills, take this first and drink plenty of water. I take many meds each morning and at first took this last. I had already had what I thought was enough water. Swallowed this and in no time found myself dealing with a strong after taste of vitamins...yummmmm...NOT! Since then I make sure to take this first with other pills to follow and drink at least 12 oz. of water during the whole endeavor. No problems now.
customer_reviews.author: BuckeyeGalForever

customer_reviews.title: Great product; Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for several years, and this was the first time I purchased it from this seller. Very happy with both!

customer_reviews.title: Has what you need all in one tablet!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, a little hard to swallow but worth it!

customer_reviews.title: Only Received 30 pills NOT 90!!
customer_reviews.text: It clearly states on the bottle that there should be 90 pills. I received one bottle with 30 pills for the price of the 90 pills. I emailed the seller to allow them to correct their error and they have not responded. I want my other 60 pills!

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE OF TOXIC B6 LEVELS IN THIS MULTIVITE!
customer_reviews.text: I took this vitamin for two years, thinking it was a safe vitamin. I began to have symptoms of neuropathy, nerve damage, and muscle cramping. There is substantial research that supports that you should not be taking high levels of B6. This multivitamin has 700% of what you need. My nerves have not recovered and I have extreme foot pain. BEWARE of noting what you are taking... more is not better in the B vitamins. I had the mistaken idea that water soluble would be excreted. Not true, your body can't keep up with such high amounts.
customer_reviews.author: A Brainard

customer_reviews.title: Active Adult 50+ is almost perfect and suits my supplementation needs better than any other ...
customer_reviews.text: I keep coming back to this brand - It's really hard to find that *perfect* multi-vitamin as there just isn't one. Rainbow Light, Active Adult 50+ is almost perfect and suits my supplementation needs better than any other MV I've been able to find. I feel it's reasonably priced. I have zero side effects (which I can't claim from the many other MV's I've tried) This does have some pro-biotics added, but I don't think they're really that good or necessary in this MV. I prefer and use a separate pro-biotic that I feel fits my needs better and has more potency.

product_meta.title: Rainbow Light Active Adult 50+ Multivitamin - 30 Tab
product_meta.description: Size:30 Count (Pack of 1)Rainbow Light Active Adult 50+ Mini-Tablet Multivitamin provides essential vitamins, minerals, antioxidants, and foods to naturally nourish and protect mature, active adults throughout the day. Three easy-to-swallow mini-tablets per day provide multivitamin protection to address the specific health needs of adults over 50 with vitamin D, a potent B-complex, Co Q-10, extra antioxidant protection, and probiotics and plant-sourced enzymes to support overall digestive health.* These multivitamins are compatible with many common prescription medications. This supplement provides powerful protection that mature bodies need throughout the day. Co Q-10, lutein, lycopene, selenium, Vitamin A, Vitamin C and zinc support immune, heart, eye, skin, and prostate health and help support cell growth, function, and maintenance* A potent vitamin B-complex promotes metabolism of energy from food and supports stress management.* In addition, 1,000 IU of vitamin D3 promotes calcium absorption for strong bones and teeth.* Nourishing Vitality Blend, includes organic spirulina superfood and concentrated kale, beet, and spinach juices, providing added nutrition for natural energy and to promote enhanced absorption and digestion of co-nutrients. A custom blend of plant-source enzymes and 90 million CFU of shelf-stable probiotics (healthy bacteria) enhances digestion without taxing your system or causing stomach upset.*
feature_bullets: WHOLE-BODY SUPPORT: Vitamins and minerals support immune, heart, skin, eye, bone, and prostate health
SUPERFOODS: Concentrated superfoods, vegetables, and vitamin B-complex for added nutrition
PROBIOTIC DIGESTIVE SUPPORT: Probiotics and plant-sourced enzymes support digestive health
EASY-TO-SWALLOW: Mini-tablets are easy to swallow
